question3_key2: Make a loop that inputs 10 numbers. After taking the input prints the sum of all those numbers.
question3_key3: This program will run like this. Everytime use input() to take the numbers as an input.
question3_key4: In the final line, Total Sum: 417 will be printed. This will be printed because sum of **10+16+9+10+56+78+98+43+21+76** is 417.
